DesignX

×

It is a simple and Minimalistic template. UI is light in color to show aesthetic of simplistic design. It is made to show case UI making skills. Colors are kept at minimal level to not distract viewers.

The site is completely responsive, supporting all screens. It is made using HTML, CSS and JQuery.

DiscoverO

×

Discovero is a web based dictionary it supports bookmarking, pronouncing and speech dictating features etc...

DiscoverO is completely responsive, supporting all screens. It is made using HTML, CSS and Javascript, Web APIs
